content: The Mad Tiger will begin the fight with a fast leap, landing with a slashing single blow you’ll need to dodge and then retaliate.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Battle - Mad Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
The Mad Tiger will begin the fight with a fast leap, landing with a slashing single blow you’ll need to dodge and then retaliate.
